title: MOVE-IN-"NOW"-*TROY-SCHOOLS*-3BRS/2BTHS-RANCH w/BASEMENT - FENCD YARD
posting_body: MOVE-IN"NOW" - AWARD WINNING **TROY SCHOOLS"**

UP-DATED **RANCH** - Very OPEN Floor Plan - Clean and Sharp
3 Bedrooms, 2 Full Baths, Living room, Family room - walk out to Private Patio,
Large Kitchen has - Granite counter tops, Stove, Refrigerator, Dish washer and Garbage disposal,
open to Dining room w/Fan
**Master bedroom has *Private Bath and all 3 Bedrooms have Ceiling Fans,
**All Window treatments.
FULL BASEMENT is 1/2 Semi finished  and Laundry room has Washer/Dryer and lots of storage.
2 Car Large attached Garage w/opener has work bench.
VERY NICE AREA - Close to School, Park, Shops and TROY COMMUNITY CENTER + LIBRARY.
Easy access to - I 75 and M 59.
Proof of Income is must - original W-2 and Pay check stubs
*1.5 months Rent Security Deposit - $3225 + 1 month rent in advance - Total $5375.
1 dog is negotiable w/fee.
NO CATS.
Renters are responsible for ALL UTILITIES, mowing the grass, removing the snow and maintenance.
